implementations.title: REMOVED ALL HARDCODED FAKE DATA
implementations.description: Complete audit and removal of ALL hardcoded/fake data from every admin page and ai-config.js. Microsites backlinks now show '--'. Competitor fallbacks return empty arrays. Analytics fallbacks return null. Every metric requires real API connection.
implementations.expectedImpact: 100% data integrity - no fake data ever shown to client
implementations.actualResult: SUCCESS - All admin pages verified clean

implementations.title: Competitors chart shows all 10 with score labels
implementations.description: Fixed chart to display all 10 competitors instead of 5, added data labels on top of bars

implementations.title: Fixed all admin page rendering issues
implementations.description: Traffic page charts now render correctly, dashboard NaN review gap fixed, competitors seoScore property fixed
implementations.expectedImpact: All 7 admin pages now display real GA4 data correctly

implementations.title: GA4 API credentials configured
implementations.description: Connected Google Analytics 4 API with service account credentials. All traffic data now pulls from real GA4.
implementations.expectedImpact: Real traffic data: 303 users, 426 sessions, 73% bounce rate visible
implementations.actualResult: SUCCESS - Live data flowing to Traffic, Dashboard, Microsites pages

implementations.title: Complete SEO Analysis Engine
implementations.description: Built /api/seo-analysis-engine with trend detection, action generation, health scoring. Built /api/weekly-seo-report for automated analysis.
implementations.expectedImpact: AI-powered SEO insights and automated weekly reports

implementations.title: Microsites page with real domains
implementations.description: Added Microsites admin page tracking 3 live domains: bestsalondelray.com, bestdelraysalon.com, bestsalonpalmbeach.com
implementations.expectedImpact: Track ROI from microsite referral traffic

implementations.title: Autonomous SEO Agent system launched
implementations.description: Unified 7-page admin dashboard (Dashboard, Traffic, Competitors, Rankings, Authority, Microsites, Agent Log). Auto-refresh every 5 minutes.

implementations.title: Google Places + Claude AI integration
implementations.description: Connected Google Places API for real competitor data. Added Claude AI for analysis recommendations.
implementations.expectedImpact: Real competitor reviews and ratings from Google
implementations.actualResult: SUCCESS - Showing Salon Sora (203 reviews), Drybar (189), etc.

implementations.title: PageSpeed API integration (free tier)
implementations.description: Connected Google PageSpeed Insights API for performance scoring without API key requirement

implementations.title: 5 SEO landing pages created
implementations.description: Created dedicated landing pages for high-value keywords: wedding hair, balayage, color correction, hair extensions, keratin treatment
implementations.expectedImpact: Rank for service-specific keywords in Delray Beach

implementations.title: 3 Microsites deployed
implementations.description: Launched 3 authority microsites: bestsalondelray.com, bestdelraysalon.com, bestsalonpalmbeach.com. All with GA tracking G-XQDLWZM5NV.
implementations.expectedImpact: Build backlinks and capture keyword variations
implementations.actualResult: SUCCESS - All 3 live and indexed by Google
